::DrillBit/KitKat2/StarScream::

"Great, thanks, Shivia. I'd love to send their sparks to the Pit and to
have SilverScout and Blaze's head on my mantle. One problem though. If
SilverScout has the virus, how do we get her into quarentine, without
our troops getting infected?" Asked DrillBit.

While saying this he armed all weapons, and transformed his arm into its
gattaling gun mode.

KitKat2 and StarScream also armed their respective weapons.
